oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Diversity oriented approach to polycyclics via cross-enyne metathesis and Diels-Alder reaction as key steps
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
SEEMA, V
BANERJEE, S
DIPAK, MK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: BIARYL SYNTHESIS
DERIVATIVES
ACIDS
Diversity-oriented synthesis
aryl acetylenes
metathesis
Diels-Alder reaction
alpha-amino acids
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Polycyclics containing biaryls have been prepared via application of cross-enyne metathesis and the Diels-Alder reaction. Here, ethylene and 1,5-hexadiene were used as a cross-metathesis partners to generate key diene intermediates.
